comments: probably the best teacher i have ever had hes so awesome and really knows what he is talking about!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: Yes, take this course! Easy A! 1 quiz, participation, attendance, mid-term, final, and 1 paper is your grade. He tells you exactly what is on the tests, straight from his notes!!!! His class is very laid back and interactive. Show him that you care about the material and participate. Also, talk to him outside of class! Easy A.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: GREAT PROFESSOR. KNOWS HIS STUFF. CLASS ONE DAY..GYM WORKOUTS THE OTHER. TWO TAKE HOME TESTS..ONE RESEARCH PAPER.. EASY FINAL. GUARANTEED A IN HIS CLASS. VERY HELPFUL!! I RECOMMEND!!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
comments: Great guy, fun attitude, knows his stuff. Easy A, you learn a lot. I really enjoyed his class.
